entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 4.6 - Giới từ
entry.content:
Exercise (at, to, Ø)

  1. My name is Heidi Muller and you may remember that I came up at / to / Ø you after your presentation yesterday. I ask at / to / Ø you the question about X. I was wondering ...
  2. Thanks for the advice you gave at / to / Ø me at dinner last night. With regard at / to / Ø what you said about X, do you happen to have any papers on...
  3. I would like to ask at / to / Ø you permission to quote part of the experimental from the following paper. I am planning to use the extract in my Ph.D. thesis, which I will send at / to / Ø you when I have completed it. I will of course acknowledge at / to / Ø the journal, the author...
  4. I attended at / to / Ø your presentation last week. Could you kindly give at / to / Ø me the link at / to / Ø the online version. By the way, I really enjoyed your talk, it was very pertinent at / to / Ø my field of research which is...
  5. Your name was given at / to / Ø me by Professor Stavros Panageas. Prof Panageas told at / to / Ø me that you have a database on 17th century Greek dialets. I was wondering if I might access at / to / Ø it.

Please leave the answers in the below comment box.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 4.5 - Giới từ
entry.content:
Exercise (at, in, into, inside, to)

  1. Heat the water at / in / into / inside / to a temperature of 50(C).
  2. It is located at / in / into / inside / to the rectangle, not outside.
  3. The vaccine is injected directly at / in / into / inside / to the patient's arm.
  4. The car moves at / in / into / inside / to a velocity of 300 km/h.
  5. We moved the mirror at / in / into / inside / to a new position.
  6. The drill penetrates at / in / into / inside / to the rock.
  7. The samples are held at / in / into / inside / to a container.
  8. The samples were at / in / into / inside / to a container.
  9. Put the samples at / in / into / inside / to a container.
  10. Watter boils at / in / into / inside / to a temperature of 100(C).

Please leave the answers in the below comment box.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 4.4 - Giới từ
entry.content:
Cũng vẫn là các giới từ among, between và of, tuy nhiên chúng ta thực hành thêm với hai giới từ nữa là from và with.

Nội dung bài thực hành

  1. We made our selection among / between / from the various systems available.
  2. Among / Between / Of the six tests, the first was the only one that gave any usable results.
  3. Communication among / between / from the two countries is at an all time low.
  4. This would help to promote the language among / between / of system engineers and designers.
  5. The first was the most significant among / between / of the six tests made.
  6. They are all synchronized between / of / with each other.
  7. They are different among / from / of each other.
  8. The funds were shared among / between / of all the many participants.

Vui lòng gửi đáp án và thảo luận vào mục Disqus bên dưới.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 4.3 - Giới từ
entry.content:
Tiếp theo chúng ta thực hành với các giới từ among, between và of. Hai giới từ among và between thường dễ bị nhầm lẫn khi sử dụng.

Nội dung bài thực hành

  1. Profits are divided equally among / between / of the workers and the share-holders, i.e. 50% to each group.
  2. Among / Between / Of the ten candidates, there was not even one that satisfied our needs.
  3. Among / Between / Of the factors to be considered are X, Y and Z.
  4. Many species have died out, among / between / of them X, Y and Z are the most well known.
  5. Among / Between / Of the methods we have tried so far, this is certainly the best.
  6. Tibet is situated among / between / of India, Pakistan and China.
  7. We had to choose among / between / of several candidates.
  8. Each pair contains an identifier. Among / Between / Of these pairs, the most suitable is...

Một vài chú thích

Nghĩa của một số từ:

  • share-holders: A shareholder, also call a stockholder, is an individual or organization (including a corporation) that legally owns a share of stock in a public or private corporation.
  • Situate (v): To place in a certain spot or position (~locate); To place under particular circumstances or in a given condition.
  • Candidate (n): A person who seeks or is selected by others for an office, honor, etc; A person taking an examination or test.

Vui lòng gửi đáp án và thảo luận vào mục Disqus bên dưới.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 4.2 - Giới từ
entry.content:
Bài thực hành về giới từ tiếp theo. Trong bài này, chúng ta sẽ thảo luận về các giới từ above, over, below, under, underneath. Trong đó, above và over đều có nghĩa là phía trên, còn below, under, underneath đều có nghĩa ở bên dưới. Tuy nhiên, chúng khác nhau như thế nào? Các bạn hãy làm các bài thực hành này và cho nhận xét.

Nội dung bài thực hành

  1. Above / Over / Below / Under / Underneath a hundred people came.
  2. Above / Over him stood Everest.
  3. An explanation follows below / under / underneath.
  4. File it below / under / underneath 'letters'.
  5. He found it below / under / underneath all the papers on this desk.
  6. The people who live above / over / below / under / underneath us.
  7. I’m working above / over / below / under / underneath her – she’s my boss.
  8. Just put it above / over / below / under / underneath.
  9. The above / over / below / under / underneath – mentioned procedure.
  10. There were above / over 500 people at the congress.
  11. Below / Under / Underneath the new nuclear regulations, we can no longer...
  12. We are working below / under / underneath pressure.
  13. We flew above / over Mont Blanc.

Một vài chú thích

Nghĩa của một số từ:

  • Everest (/ˈɛvərɪst/): A mountain, 8,850 m (29,035 ft) high, of the central Himalaya Mountains on the border of Tibet and Nepal.
  • Mont Blanc: a mountain in SE France, near the Italian border: highest peak of the Alps, 15,781 ft. (4810 m).
  • File (v): To put items in a file.

Vui lòng gửi đáp án và thảo luận vào mục Disqus bên dưới.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 4.1 - Giới từ
entry.content:
Bài tập thực hành này mở đầu chuỗi bài về giới từ (Prepositions). Trong bài này, chúng ta sẽ thảo luận về 3 giới từ about, for, of. Trong 3 giới từ này, for và of hay bị sử dụng nhầm lẫn với nhau nhất. Các bạn lưu ý là các bài thực hành ở đây tập trung vào chủ đề "Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật", nên từ ngữ và nội dung thường mang tính chuyên môn và có phạm vi hẹp.

Nội dung bài thực hành

  1. The samples were not suitable for / of / about this purpose.
  2. So how long have you been working for / of / about them?
  3. The topics are reserved for / about / of future work.
  4. The subjects were asked about / for / of their experience in this field.
  5. This raises many questions of / for / about whether animals should be used in such tests.
  6. We opted about / of / for a small sample size due to financial considerations.
  7. A total of / for / about the patients of both sexes were recruited for / of / about this study.
  8. One of the main issues in what we know about / for / of Facebook in usage is the fact that no reliable data are available before 2008.
  9. The prospect about / for / of being able to help patients with this condition, serves as the continuous insentive about / of / for future research.
  10. We chose this particular apparatus on amount about / for / of the fact that it is considered the best equipment of / for / about this type of investigation.

Một vài chú thích

Nghĩa của một số từ:

  • Apparatus (/,æpə'reitəs/): bộ máy, dụng cụ (ex: the digestive apparatus, fishing apparatus,...)
  • on amount of: do, bởi vì
  • Recruit (/ri'kru:t/): tuyển chọn

Vui lòng gửi đáp án và thảo luận vào mục Disqus bên dưới.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 3.2
entry.content:
Bài tập thực hành này tiếp tục về danh từ (noun), với những từ sau: basis, degree, extent, level, region. Mục đích của bài này nhằm giúp người đọc phân biệt các trường hợp sử dụng giữa degree vs. level, level vs. basis vs. extent, basis vs. region.

Nội dung bài thực hành

  1. At the conceptual basis / level / degree it is certainly true that females show greater aptitude to learning languages than males.
  2. New ways of working from home are attracting growing interest on an international basis / level / region.
  3. We investigated how the severity of memory impairment was affected by variations in the level / degree / extent of damage to the medial temporal lobe memory system.
  4. To a large degree / level / extent, the choice of interaction style should relate to the user requirements.
  5. Poverty levels used to be of concern, but in recent years goverment have, to a large basis / extent / region, neglected the problem.
  6. MR imaging is sensitive to alternations in the motion of water molecules in the extent / region / level of the brain studied.
  7. We found that pollution values in the region / extent / level of Prydz Bay, Antarctica have increased by 22% in the last two years.
  8. All related links will be posted on the course website on the regular extent / basis / level.
  9. Reviews should be carried out both at the region / level / basis of the entire program and at the degree / extent / level of the individual researchers.
  10. We investigate to what degree / extent / level being bilingual means being more tolerant and open to the world.

Một vài chú thích

Nghĩa của một số từ:

  • Extent: the space or degree to which a thing extends; quy mô, phạm vi.
  • Molecule (/´mɔli¸kju:l/): two or more atoms held together by chemical bonds; phân tử.
  • Impairment: The result of being impaired; become worse; sự suy yếu, sự sút kém.
  • Poverty (/ˈpɒvəti/): condition of being poor; the state or condition of having little or no money, goods, or means of support; (cảnh bần hàn).
  • Neglect: to pay no attention or too little attention to; bỏ bê, bỏ mặc.
  • MR imaging: Magnetic Resonance Imaging; chụp ảnh cộng hưởng từ.
  • Sensitive: (photographic paper is highly sensitive to light).
  • Bilingual (/bai´liηgwəl/): Having the ability to speak two languages; có khả năng nói hai thứ tiếng.

Vui lòng gửi đáp án và thảo luận vào mục Disqus bên dưới.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 3.1
entry.content:
Trong bài tập thực hành này, các bạn hãy chọn danh từ: base hoặc basis phù hợp với nội dung của câu.

  1. This is then used as base / basis for comparison.
  2. Such resources may provide both the base / basis and the direction for the growth of the knownledge base / basis of a firm.
  3. The aim of this paper is to provide the conceptual base / basis for the systematic treatment of ...
  4. The research base / basis for performance-based teacher education is founded on...
  5. This can be clearly seen at the base / basis of the axis.
  6. The sharp discontinuity at the base / basis of the Earch's mantle has been suggested from seismic waveform studies.
  7. The angle at the base / basis of the triangle is always higher than the angle at ...
  8. There appears to be no base / basis for their hypothesis.

Vui lòng gửi đáp án và thảo luận vào mục Disqus bên dưới.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 2.2
entry.content:
Bài tập thực hành tiếp theo với các từ nối: also, as well as, even, too. Chọn một từ nối phù hợp với nội dung của câu.

  1. These values are reported in Table 1, which also/ as well as/ even/ too shows the values of the previous tests.
  2. Most of those questioned refused to participate, also/ as well as/ even/ too when offered money.
  3. Spainish is spoken in several South American countries, also/ as well as/ even/ too in Spain.
  4. Also / As well as / Even / Too being one of the leading experts in the field, she is also/ as well as/ even/ too is trained violinist.
  5. It seems as if no expense is too great in order to prolong life, also / as well as / even / too when patients clearly only have days or weeks to live.
  6. This is not only true of students, Professor, also/ as well as/ even/ too, will suffer if the government introduces these measures.
  7. Also / As well as / Even / Too if this were true, which it certainly is not, it would have no effect at all.

Vui lòng gửi đáp án và thảo luận vào mục Disqus bên dưới.

entry.title: Tiếng Anh dùng trong nghiên cứu học thuật - Thực hành từ vựng 2.1
entry.content:
Bài này thực hành với các từ nối: according to, depending on, following, in accordance with, in agreement with, in compliance with. Chọn một từ nối phù hợp với nội dung của câu.

  1. Breast cancer among premenopausal women also showed variation according to/ in accordance with/ in agreement with the history of patients.
  2. Dataset characteristics of each problem were measured according to/ depending on/ following Smith et al. [4] and [7].
  3. Depending on / Following / In agreement with the status of the couple, various solutions are possible: ...
  4. According to/ In accordance with/ Following this method, the Bernoulli and hydrostatic equations can be combined to give ...
  5. For all three proteins we obtained polypeptide chains with molecular weights in agreement with/ in compliance with/ in accordance with the values from the literature.
  6. The focus can be on the insertion or deletion of each video shot, depending on/ in compiance with/ in agreement with user preference.
  7. The objective of the present study was to estimate 10 years probabilities of osteoporotic fractures in men and women according to/ in compliance with / in agreement with age and bone mineral density[^bone-mineral-density].
  8. Our result were according to/ in compliance with / in agreement with the literature.
  9. They were used according to/ depending on/ in agreement with the manufacturer's operating manual.
  10. To date, all the tests have been carried out according to/ in compliance with/ in agreement with EU regulations.
  11. According to/ Depending on/ In compliance with the archives, he was born in Paris (not in London).

Vui lòng gửi đáp án và thảo luận vào mục Disqus bên dưới.

[^bone-mineral-density]: "Bone mineral density" là thuật ngữ chuyên môn trong y học, được dịch là "trọng khoáng của xương".
